page.title: 13My family in Capel Seion
page.content: My name is Bethan Sian Jones & I live at Delfryn, Capel Seion with Dad, Mum & my brother Aled. Aled & I both go to Capel seion Primary School. My hobbies are cycling, swimming & helping Dad at work. Dad is employed as a salesman for our local bakery. He has worked there for 22 years since leaving school. My mother also has a parttime job as a Welfare Driver for Social Services. Aled & I have two dogs named Russ & Suki, two birds named Benji & Joey and a fish pond containing several types of fish.
